sentences.sContent: economic policies that threaten to undermine the health care system
sentences.sCn: 可能会损害医疗保健制度的经济政策

synos.tran: 破坏，渐渐破坏；挖掘地基

remMethod.val: under (在…下) + mine (挖) → 挖墙角 → 暗中破坏

trans.tranCn: 暗中破坏， 逐渐削弱； 侵蚀…的基础
trans.tranOther: to gradually make someone or something less strong or effective
